title: Honor Level Up
body: Hi, Rynojos here, and I am level 0 honor. I have played 62 games (or more) in the past 16 days and its been about a month since I got my honor unlocked. Ive been getting decent amounts of honors, and I remain encouraging and positive in game. But, I still haven't shown any signs of progress to honor 1. Am I even progressing?

replies.body: I'm honor level 0 too because of a mistake I never thought I would make.

I've checked over your match history and recent honor changes, and it *does* look like it's taking a bit longer than usual but you ARE getting that honor exp. It might be a little slow if you've been getting honored by premades, which don't give you *quite* as much as being honored by a random teammate.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=9muUbrdN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-29T04:16:08.923+0000)
>
> I've checked over your match history and recent honor changes, and it *does* look like it's taking a bit longer than usual but you ARE getting that honor exp. It might be a little slow if you've been getting honored by premades, which don't give you *quite* as much as being honored by a random teammate.

But, more often than not, I'm being honored by randoms. Is there any way I can speed up my xp gain?
